mapper.insert: insert into payment (sales_seq, amount_date, member_id, payment_amount, status, regdate) values (#{sales_seq}, STR_TO_DATE (#{amount_date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{member_id}, #{payment_amount}, #{status}, now())
mapper.update: update payment set sales_seq = #{sales_seq}, amount_date=STR_TO_DATE (#{amount_date}, '%Y-%m-%d'), member_id = #{member_id}, payment_amount = #{payment_amount}, status=#{status}, updatedate = now() where seq = #{seq}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(s.payment_amount),0) as cnt from sales s where s.sales_member = #{userId} and pid = 1
select IFNULL(sum(s.payment_amount),0) as cnt from sales s where s.sales_member = #{userId} and pid in (2,3,4,5)
select IFNULL(sum(s.payment_amount),0) as cnt from sales s where s.sales_member = #{userId} and pid in (6, 7)
select IFNULL(sum(s.payment_amount),0) from payment s where s.member_id = #{userId}
select * from sales where sales_member = #{userId} and pid in (1)
select * from sales where sales_member = #{userId} and pid in (2,3,4,5)

select p.*, (select m.name from member m where s.sales_member=m.userid) as sales_member_name, (select pr.product_name from product pr where s.pid = pr.pid) as product_name, s.purchase_name as purchase_name, s.purchase_date purchase_date from payment p, sales s where member_id = #{userId} and s.seq = p.sales_seq
